Hey team!

I need help setting up an API endpoint.
The thing is, I'm integrating HubSpot into Bubble and I'm having a problem.
For example, I need to display all the information (fields) about the companies that are in HubSpot.
However, when I connect via API using the endpoint <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/companies> I only get information in the "name", "domain" and "registration date" fields.  Similarly with the contact list.
Maybe you can tell me what manual I need to learn in order to use the correct endpoint?
Is the json you are sending the entire payload?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations>

You can specify what is returned to you by adjusting the properties. 

Add the properties you want and those will be returned
So you are saying you can update a contact via email in the v4 api? What's the url?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1659530761365489>
Thats v3, maybe try it with the v3 batch! I don’t have a way to help you find something I know nothing about, good luck

<@U25PYL3Q8> Thank you!
Where can I set this up?
Thats from another Endpoint. But should be the same concept.
from there you have to look up the contact by the id using the contacts api! that ID is the answer!

<@U03TEE8FD3M> <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/companies>
<https://share.getcloudapp.com/llu0PzGk>

Sorry I was on mobile earlier and my screenshots didn’t upload

as thomas points out, regular api call you can use the ?properties=firsname,lastname like that --- if you are using the node api or other things they have examples on the page I linked when get to the companies get call

<@UD53A9UUR> it looks like adrian is referencing a post you posted. I’m curious, does v4 have email lookup still? What was the technical limitation that prevents…whatever you are referencing here (<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1659530761365489>)
<@U033VNNBBBP> <@U25PYL3Q8> thanx guys!
tbh imo updating/changing contacts using their emails is a basic feature and every api version should support it.

a great place to champion that is here: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas> <@U03SVN29AKA> — after you get it posted, share it in the api main channel and I’m sure we can get some traction on it

Hello everyone :grin:, does anyone know if there's a way to filter the contacts I want to collect on the contact read endpoint based on preperties values? For example, let's say I want to collect data only from contacts who are above 18 years old, is there a way I can do that with the api endpoints? I would be very thankful for an answer

This saved my reps a lot of manual time, deleting all the tasks that were no longer relevant! :pray:
you would want to use crm objects query
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>, click endpoints and look for the search (post) endpoint */crm/v3/objects/contacts/search*
